general.gigTitle: develop hubspot landing page hubspot website hubspot quote

sellerCard.description:
I'm a certified HubSpot developer specializing in HubSpot CMS design and development. I help businesses create professional, conversion-focused websites on the HubSpot platform. Whether you need a complete site build, landing page, custom modules, or a tailored quote template, I can deliver high-quality results.

Services include:

# HubSpot CMS website design
# Custom themes & templates
# Landing page optimization
# HubSpot blog setup
# Email template development
# Custom modules & quotes
# Website optimization

Let’s create a HubSpot solution tailored to your business needs!

description.content:
I'm a certified HubSpot developer with over four years of experience. I've built more than 200 websites and landing pages and tons of blogs using HubSpot's easy drag-and-drop tools.


Here is the breakdown of all the gig packages.


Basic Development Plan

  • 1 fully editable landing/website page or 4 hours of HubSpot development
  • Up to 5 modules. 2 default HubSpot modules and 3 custom modules development included
  • No mega menu or Complex menu and footer
  • Lightning fast page load speed


Standard Development Plan

  • 1 fully editable landing/website page or 6 hours of HubSpot development
  • Up to 7 modules. 2 default HubSpot modules and 5 custom modules development included
  • No mega menu or Complex menu and footer
  • Lightning fast page load speed
  • Compatible with the theme currently in use.


Advance Development Plan

  • 1 fully editable landing/website page or 10 hours of HubSpot development
  • Up to 10 modules. 3 default HubSpot modules and 7 custom modules development included
  • No mega menu or Complex menu and footer
  • Lightning fast page load speed
  • Compatible with the theme currently in use.

openGraph.title: develop hubspot landing page hubspot website hubspot quote

reviews.comment: The experience of working with Hubspot Techie was disappointing. The project faced numerous delays, as he missed every deadline and didn’t fully meet the requirements outlined in the original brief. Despite no changes to the scope, he requested additional payment, which added to the frustration. To top it off, a critical email sent to a large group failed to work as intended, which was a major letdown. While he did eventually deliver, the overall process was far from satisfactory.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for the thoughtful review. Out of 51 clients, I’m glad to know my services were uniquely “disappointing” for you.

The numerous delays and scope changes were indeed unavoidable—especially when the initial request for a custom email/newsletter in HubSpot magically transformed into a need for a drag-and-drop template after the first deliverable was completed. Despite this major change, I graciously agreed to proceed without additional payment—because who doesn’t love redoing work for free?

As for the email rendering issue, defining image width and height is a basic email design principle, but I understand how easily such details can be overlooked when sending emails.

Lastly, the extra requests labeled as “feedback” at the end of the project were a pleasant surprise. Even though they were outside the agreed scope, I still addressed them—because delivering more than promised is clearly the way to go.

Thank you again for the enlightening experience. It’s feedback like this that truly keeps the job exciting.

reviews.comment: Hubspot Techie truly IMPRESSED with their impeccable attention to detail and professionalism in website development. Their code expertise and POLITE demeanor made collaboration seamless, and they consistently went above and beyond expectations. Highly recommend their services! 🙌

Hubspot Techie is an outstanding website developer! His PROFESSIONALISM and code expertise shine through in every project, and his quick responsiveness and polite communication make him a joy to work with. Consistently delivering top-quality results—HIGHLY recommended! 👍

Working with Hubspot Techie was a pleasure! The professionalism and attention to detail in the website development were impressive; everything was executed flawlessly. Their proactive communication and timely delivery made the process SMOOTH and efficient. 👏

First phase of the project is just finished. Enjoyed working together with Hubspot_Techie. 

Looking forward to the next phase and finalising the project!
